verses.verse: I will extol<WH7311> you,<WH3068> Yahweh, for you have raised me up,<WH1802> and have not made my foes<WH341> to rejoice over me.<WH8055>
Yahweh<WH3068> my God,<WH430> I cried<WH7768> to you,<WH7495> and you have healed me.
Yahweh,<WH3068> you have brought up<WH5927> my soul<WH5315> from Sheol.<WH7585> You have kept me alive,<WH2421> that I should not go down<WH3381> to the pit.<WH953>
Sing<WH2167> praise to Yahweh,<WH3068> you saints<WH2623> of his.<WH3034> Give thanks to his holy<WH6944> name.<WH2143>
For his anger<WH639> is but for a moment.<WH7281> His favor<WH7522> is for a lifetime.<WH2416> Weeping<WH1065> may stay<WH3885> for the night,<WH6153> but joy<WH7440> comes in the morning.<WH1242>
As for me,<WH559> I said in my prosperity,<WH7959> "I shall never<WH5769> be moved.<WH4131>"
You,<WH3068> Yahweh, when you favored<WH7522> me,<WH2042> made my mountain stand<WH5975> strong;<WH5797> but when you hid<WH5641> your face,<WH6440> I was troubled.<WH926>
I cried<WH7121> to you,<WH3068> Yahweh. To Yahweh<WH3068> I made supplication:<WH2603>
"What profit<WH1215> is there in my destruction,<WH1818> if I go down<WH3381> to the pit?<WH7845> Shall the dust<WH6083> praise<WH3034> you?<WH5046> Shall it declare your truth?<WH571>
Hear,<WH8085> Yahweh,<WH3068> and have mercy<WH2603> on me.<WH3068> Yahweh, be my helper.<WH5826>"
You have turned<WH2015> my mourning<WH4553> into dancing<WH4234> for me.<WH6605> You have removed my sackcloth,<WH8242> and clothed<WH247> me with gladness,<WH8057>
To the end that my heart<WH3519> may sing<WH2167> praise to you,<WH1826> and not be silent. Yahweh<WH3068> my God,<WH430> I will give thanks<WH3034> to you forever!<WH5769>
